verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> was <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G321>led<s%> up of the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to be <S%G3985>tempted<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>
And when he had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G3571>nights,<s%> he was <S%G5305>afterward<s%> an <S%G3983>hungered.<s%>

And when the <S%G3985>tempter<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2036>command<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G444>Man<s%> shall not <S%G2198>live<s%> by <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> but by <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> that <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>takes<s%> him up <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G2476>sets<s%> him <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%>

And <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>If<s%> you be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G2736>down:<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> He shall give his <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> you: and in their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they shall <S%G142>bear<s%> you up, <S%G3379>lest<s%> <S%G3379>at<s%> <S%G3379>any<s%> <S%G3379>time<s%> you <S%G4350>dash<s%> your <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, It is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> You shall not <S%G1598>tempt<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>takes<s%> him up <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> and <S%G1166>shows<s%> him <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of them;
And <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things will I <S%G1325>give<s%> you, <S%G1437>if<s%> you will <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> me.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to him, <S%G5217>Get<s%> you <S%G5217>hence,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan:<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> You shall <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God,<s%> and him <S%G3441>only<s%> shall you serve. <S%G3000><s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G863>leaves<s%> him, and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to him.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G3860>cast<s%> into <S%G3860>prison,<s%> he <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%>

And <S%G2641>leaving<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>dwelled<s%> in <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is on the <S%G3864>sea<s%> <S%G3864>coast,<s%> in the <S%G3725>borders<s%> of <S%G2194>Zabulon<s%> and <S%G3508>Nephthalim:<s%>
That it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> by <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

The <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2194>Zabulon,<s%> and the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G3508>Nephthalim,<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%>

The <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> in <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5457>light;<s%> and to them <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> in the <S%G5561>region<s%> and <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> is <S%G393>sprung<s%> up.

From that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2784>preach,<s%> and to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3340>Repent:<s%> for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G1448>at<s%> hand. <S%G1448><s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> by the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea:<s%> for they were <S%G231>fishers.<s%>
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Follow <S%G1205><s%> <S%G3694><s%> me, and I will <S%G4160>make<s%> you <S%G231>fishers<s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And they <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> their <S%G1350>nets,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> him.

And <S%G4260>going<s%> on from <S%G1564>there,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> in a <S%G4143>ship<s%> with <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> their <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> their <S%G1350>nets;<s%> and he <S%G2564>called<s%> them.
And they <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> and their <S%G3962>father,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> him.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4013>went<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in their <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G3554>sickness<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G3119>disease<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And his <S%G189>fame<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G4947>Syria:<s%> and they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>sick<s%> <S%G2560><s%> people that were <S%G4912>taken<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> and <S%G931>torments,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> which were <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with <S%G1139>devils,<s%> and those which were <S%G4583>lunatic,<s%> and those that had the <S%G3885>palsy;<s%> and he <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.

And there <S%G190>followed<s%> him <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> of people from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and from <S%G1179>Decapolis,<s%> and from <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and from <S%G2449>Judaea,<s%> and from <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan.<s%>
